    • Constructor Detail

      • ChanceCard

        public ChanceCard(int cardID,
                  int cardValue,
                  java.lang.String cardText)
        The constructor for a Chancecard.
        Parameters:
        cardID - the ID for the card. This is used to identify the card.
        cardValue - the value of the card. This is used to determine the affection on the player.
        cardText - the text on the card. This is used to display a text on the card.
